did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

persname.normal: [give the MARC presentation of creator here, i.e., surname first; include dates]

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Scrapbook of clippings pertaining to fruit cultivation made by Crissey of Fredonia, New York; miscellaneous loose clippings, pamphlets, and other material on grape culture and related agricultural problems; also, periodicals pertaining to fruit and grapes.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook of clippings pertaining to fruit cultivation made by Crissey of Fredonia, New York; miscellaneous loose clippings, pamphlets, and other material on grape culture and related agricultural problems; also, periodicals pertaining to fruit and grapes.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Fruit culture Miscellany, #1325. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIAL
relatedmaterial.p: Part of the Eastern Wine and Grape Archive
